entry.title: FortiOS 测试环境漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： FortiOS 测试环境漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-23113

漏洞类型： 其他

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 这是一个Docker基础的测试环境，用于验证CVE-2024-23113 Nuclei模板对模拟的易受攻击的FortiOS实例的检测能力。它提供了包括登录页面、API端点和正确的版本信息在内的真实FortiOS响应。

产品厂商： Fortinet

产品名称： FortiOS

影响版本： 7.4.0, 7.4.1, 7.4.2, 7.2.0 through 7.2.6, 7.0.0 through 7.0.13

来源： https://github.com/MAVRICK-1/cve-2024-23113-test-env

类型： CVE-2024:github search

仓库文件

  • .dockerignore
  • Dockerfile
  • README.md
  • docker-compose.yml
  • server.py

来源概述

CVE-2024-23113 FortiOS Test Environment

A Docker-based test environment for validating CVE-2024-23113 Nuclei templates against simulated vulnerable FortiOS instances.

🔍 Overview

This environment simulates vulnerable FortiOS HTTP interfaces to test the detection capabilities of CVE-2024-23113 Nuclei templates. It provides realistic FortiOS responses including login pages, API endpoints, and proper version information.

🚀 Quick Start

Prerequisites

  • Docker
  • Docker Compose
  • Nuclei (for testing)

Basic Setup

  1. Clone and build:
  1. Verify the environment:
  1. Test with Nuclei:

🎯 Available Environments

Default Environment

  • Service: fortios-vulnerable
  • Port: 8080
  • Version: FortiOS v7.2.5 (vulnerable)
  • URL: http://localhost:8080

Additional Test Environments

Available Profiles:
  • Default: FortiOS v7.2.5 (vulnerable) - Port 8080
  • Patched: FortiOS v7.2.7 (patched) - Port 8081
  • Multiple:
    • FortiOS v7.4.1 (vulnerable) - Port 8082
    • FortiOS v7.0.10 (vulnerable) - Port 8083

🔧 Configuration

Environment Variables

VariableDescriptionDefault
FORTIOS_VERSIONFortiOS version to simulate7.2.5
PORTContainer internal port8080

Custom Version

📡 API Endpoints

The simulated FortiOS provides these endpoints:

EndpointDescriptionContent-Type
/Main login pagetext/html
/loginLogin formtext/html
/remote/loginRemote access portaltext/html
/api/v2/monitor/system/statusSystem status APIapplication/json
/api/v2/cmdb/system/globalGlobal config APIapplication/json

Example API Response

🧪 Testing Scenarios

Vulnerable Versions Detection

Patched Version Validation

Batch Testing

🔍 Manual Testing

Check Service Response

Expected Vulnerable Indicators

  • HTML: Contains FortiOS v7.2.5
  • Server Header: FortiGate-HTTP/v7.2.5
  • API Response: "version": "v7.2.5"

🐛 Troubleshooting

Common Issues

Port Already in Use
Container Won’t Start
Health Check Failing

Debugging

📋 Vulnerable Versions

This environment can simulate any of these vulnerable versions:

FortiOS

  • 7.4.0, 7.4.1, 7.4.2
  • 7.2.0 through 7.2.6
  • 7.0.0 through 7.0.13

FortiProxy

  • 7.4.0, 7.4.1, 7.4.2
  • 7.2.0 through 7.2.8
  • 7.0.0 through 7.0.14

Example Usage

🏗️ Development

Building from Source

Customizing Responses

Edit server.py to modify:

  • HTML responses
  • API endpoint data
  • Server headers
  • Version information

⚠️ Security Notice

This is a test environment only:

  • ✅ Use for security testing and template validation
  • ✅ Use in isolated lab environments
  • ❌ Never expose to public networks
  • ❌ Never use in production

📚 References

  • CVE-2024-23113 Details
  • Fortinet Security Advisory
  • CISA KEV Catalog
  • Nuclei Templates Repository

📞 Support

For issues with this test environment:

  1. Check the troubleshooting section
  2. Review container logs
  3. Verify Nuclei template syntax
  4. Test with manual curl requests

Remember: This environment is for authorized security testing only. Always ensure you have permission before testing any systems.

漏洞信息

漏洞名称： FortiOS 测试环境漏洞

漏洞编号：

entry.title: Fortinet FortiOS/FortiProxy/FortiPAM/FortiSwitchManager 格式字符串漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fortinet FortiOS/FortiProxy/FortiPAM/FortiSwitchManager 格式字符串漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-23113

漏洞类型： 格式字符串

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fortinet FortiOS fgfmd守护进程及相关Fortinet产品中存在一个格式字符串漏洞。此漏洞允许远程未经认证的攻击者通过向FGFM服务发送特制请求来执行任意代码或命令。漏洞由fgfmd守护进程中对外部控制的格式字符串的不当处理引起，可在无需认证的情况下被利用。成功利用可能导致系统完全被攻陷、数据泄露、横向移动及对网络基础设施的持久访问。

产品厂商： Fortinet

产品名称： FortiOS, FortiProxy, FortiPAM, FortiSwitchManager

影响版本： FortiOS v7.4.0 - v7.4.2, v7.2.0 - v7.2.6, v7.0.0 - v7.0.13; FortiProxy v7.4.0 - v7.4.2, v7.2.0 - v7.2.8, v7.0.0 - v7.0.14; FortiPAM v1.2.0, v1.1.0 - v1.1.2, v1.0.0 - v1.0.3; FortiSwitchManager v7.2.0 - v7.2.3, v7.0.0 - v7.0.3

搜索语法： title=”FortiGate” || title=”FortiProxy” || title=”FortiPAM”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/822d17f6e26bcee3d909324b5158a6d9990280da/http%2Fcves%2F2024%2FCVE-2024-23113.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情

漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fortinet FortiOS/FortiProxy/F

entry.title: Microsoft Outlook 远程代码执行漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Microsoft Outlook 远程代码执行漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-21413

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Microsoft Outlook 存在远程代码执行漏洞，攻击者可通过特制的Moniker Link利用此漏洞执行任意代码。

产品厂商： Microsoft

产品名称： Outlook

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: Fortinet FortiOS & FortiProxy 格式字符串漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Fortinet FortiOS & FortiProxy 格式字符串漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2024-23113

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Fortinet FortiOS、FortiProxy、FortiPAM和FortiSwitchManager中存在一个由外部控制的格式字符串漏洞，攻击者通过处理特制的数据包，可以执行任意代码或命令。

产品厂商： Fortinet

产品名称： FortiOS, FortiProxy, FortiPAM, FortiSwitchManager

影响版本： FortiOS (7.4.0-7.4.2, 7.2.0-7.2.6, 7.0.0-7.0.13), FortiProxy (7.4.0-7.4.2, 7.2.0-7.2.8, 7.0.0-7.0.14), FortiPAM (1.2.0, 1.1.0-1.1.2, 1.0.0-1.0.3), FortiSwitchManager (7.2.0-7.2.3, 7.0.0-7.0.3)

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:fortinet:fortios”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12222

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Fortinet FortiOS (versions 7.4.0-7.4.2, 7.2.0-7.2.6, 7.0.0-7.0.13), FortiProxy (versions 7.4.0-7.4.2, 7.2.0-7.2.8, 7.0.0-7.0.14), FortiPAM (versions 1.2.0, 1.1.0-1.1.2, 1.0.0-1.0.3), and FortiSwitchManager (versions 7.2.0-7.2.3, 7.0.0-7.0.3) contain a use of externally-controlled format string caused by processing specially crafted packets, letting attackers execute arbitrary code or commands.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/aad788d038d3
  • https://github.com/valornode/CVE-2024-23113
  • https///github.com:valornode/CVE-2024-23113.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/b3ae997acc06
  • https://github.com/XiaomingX/cve-2024-23113-poc
  • https///github.com:XiaomingX/cve-2024-23113-poc.git
  • https://github.com/XiaomingX/cve-2024-23113-exp
  • https://github.com/expl0itsecurity/CVE-2024-23113
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/0548206afc9c
  • https://github.com/puckiestyle/CVE-2024-23113
  • https///github.com:puckiestyle/CVE-2024-23113.git
  • https://vulncheck.com/xdb/3039091c436b
  • https://github.com/p33d/CVE-2024-23113
  • https///github.com:p33d/CVE-2024-23113.git
  • https://github.com/CheckCve2/CVE-2024-23113

KEV: True

Shodan Query: cpe:"cpe:2.3:o:fortinet:fortios"

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.

entry.title: Periodic Script Persistence
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Periodic Script Persistence

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： 该模块通过在/etc/periodic目录中写入脚本实现持久化。根据The Art of Mac Malware，目前没有恶意软件以此方式持久化（2024年）。此有效负载需要root权限才能运行。该模块可在BSD、OSX或Arch Linux上运行。

产品名称： Mac OS X, BSD, Arch Linux

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/e465720a3c0a51136d96fa41ed70f4827c1e77dc/modules%2Fexploits%2Fmulti%2Flocal%2Fperiodic_script_persistence.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Periodic Script Persistence

entry.title: Sudo Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Sudo Local Privilege Escalation Vulnerability

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-32463

漏洞类型： 权限提升

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： CVE-2025-32463是Sudo二进制文件中的一个本地权限提升漏洞。该漏洞允许本地用户在特定错误配置或通过精心构造的输入下将权限提升至root。此问题由Rich Mirch发现。攻击者可以利用此漏洞获得root访问权限，完全控制系统。

产品厂商： sudo project

产品名称： sudo

来源： https://github.com/kh4sh3i/CVE-2025-32463

类型： CVE-2025:github search

仓库文件

  • LICENSE
  • README.md
  • exploit.sh
  • img

来源概述

CVE-2025-32463

Local Privilege Escalation to Root via Sudo chroot in Linux

🛑 Vulnerability Summary

CVE-2025-32463 is a local privilege escalation vulnerability in the Sudo binary. The flaw allows a local user to escalate privileges to root under specific misconfigurations or with crafted inputs. The issue was discovered by Rich Mirch.

  • CVE-ID: CVE-2025-32463
  • Component: sudo
  • Type: Local Privilege Escalation (EoP)
  • CVSS Score: TBD
  • Discovered by: Rich Mirch

🔥 Impact

An attacker with low privileges can exploit this vulnerability to gain root access, compromising the system entirely.

🧪 Proof of Concept

Exploit

🛠 Requirements

  • Affected version of sudo
  • Local shell access

🛡️ Mitigation

  • Update sudo to the latest patched version.
  • Use security frameworks like AppArmor or SELinux to limit sudo behavior.
  • Monitor for abnormal sudo invocations.

🧷 References

  • CVE-2025-32463 on NVD
  • Rich Mirch on Twitter
  • sudo project

⚠️ Disclaimer

This PoC is provided for educational and research purposes only. Running this on any system without permission is illegal and unethical.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Sudo Local Privilege Escalation Vulnera

entry.title: The Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload (Pro) - WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c438-893p-pq8h

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-5746

  • https://www.codedropz.com/woocommerce-drag-drop-multiple-file-upload

  • https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/3c1f625e-4456-45e4-8a7f-809b22edb66b?source=cve

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c438-893p-pq8h

描述：

The Drag and Drop Multiple File Upload (Pro) - WooCommerce plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to arbitrary file uploads due to missing file type validation in the dnd_upload_cf7_upload_chunks() function in version 5.0 - 5.0.5 (when bundled with the PrintSpace theme) and all versions up to, and including, 1.7.1 (in the standalone version). This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to upload arbitrary files on the affected site’s server which may make remote code execution possible. The execution of PHP is disabled via a .htaccess file but is still possible in certain server configurations.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c438-893p-pq8h

entry.title: The Ads Pro Plugin - Multi-Purpose WordPress Advertising Manager plugin for WordPress is
entry.content:
链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c9gr-fm33-6r9r

CVSS 评分： 9.8

参考链接：

  • https://nvd.nist.gov/vuln/detail/CVE-2025-4689

  • https://codecanyon.net/item/ads-pro-plugin-multipurpose-wordpress-advertising-manager/10275010

  • https://www.wordfence.com/threat-intel/vulnerabilities/id/038ddfcd-093b-4234-a0b8-a3bf9a3d329f?source=cve

  • https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c9gr-fm33-6r9r

描述：

The Ads Pro Plugin - Multi-Purpose WordPress Advertising Manager plugin for WordPress is vulnerable to Local File Inclusion which leads to Remote Code Execution in all versions up to, and including, 4.89. This is due to the presence of a SQL Injection vulnerability and Local File Inclusion vulnerability that can be chained with an image upload. This makes it possible for unauthenticated attackers to execute code on the server upload image files on the server than can be fetched via a SQL injection vulnerability, and ultimately executed as PHP code through the local file inclusion vulnerability.
entry.summary: 链接： https://github.com/advisories/GHSA-c9gr-fm33-6r9r

entry.title: Wing FTP Server NULL-byte Authentication Bypass
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wing FTP Server NULL-byte Authentication Bypass

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2025-47812

漏洞类型： 命令执行

漏洞等级： 高危

漏洞描述： Wing FTP Server 存在一个通过NULL字节（%00）截断漏洞（CVE-2025-47812）的Lua代码注入问题。提供%00作为用户名，使得C++认证例程仅验证前缀，而完整字符串未经过滤写入会话文件，随后以root/SYSTEM权限执行，导致远程代码执行。

产品厂商： Wing FTP Server

产品名称： Wing FTP Server

来源： https://github.com/rapid7/metasploit-framework/blob/5b268bd4b408e61e5fb8479823fbe72d670d3110/modules%2Fexploits%2Fmulti%2Fhttp%2Fwingftp_null_byte_rce.rb

类型： rapid7/metasploit-framework:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Wing FTP Server NULL-byte Authenticatio

entry.title: Cisco IOS Smart Install 缓冲区溢出漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install 缓冲区溢出漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2018-0171

漏洞类型： 缓冲区溢出

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Cisco IOS和IOS XE软件中的Smart Install协议存在缓冲区溢出漏洞。未经身份验证的远程攻击者可以通过向受影响设备的TCP端口4786发送特制的Smart Install消息来利用此漏洞。成功利用此漏洞可能导致攻击者在受影响的设备上造成缓冲区溢出，进而可能导致任意代码执行、拒绝服务（设备重新启动）或使设备陷入消耗CPU资源的无限循环中。

产品厂商： Cisco

产品名称： Cisco IOS

搜索语法： cpe:”cpe:2.3:o:cisco:ios”

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/blob/e5d3813f4180c7cf83ee4729ebd2654f61cdc178/network%2Fcves%2F2018%2FCVE-2018-0171.yaml

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

POC详情
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Cisco IOS Smart Install 缓冲区溢出漏洞

entry.title: Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞
entry.content:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号：

  • CVE： CVE-2019-17564

漏洞类型： 反序列化

漏洞等级： 严重

漏洞描述： Apache Dubbo 2.7.0至2.7.4、2.6.0至2.6.7以及所有2.5.x版本中存在反序列化漏洞，原因是接受HTTP POST请求中的不受信任的Java对象，如果启用了HTTP，攻击者可以完全控制Provider实例，利用此漏洞需要攻击者发送恶意的Java对象。

产品厂商： Apache

产品名称： Dubbo

影响版本： 2.5.x, 2.6.0 <= version <= 2.6.7, 2.7.0 <= version <= 2.7.4

来源： https://github.com/projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates/issues/12444

类型： projectdiscovery/nuclei-templates:github issues

来源概述

Description:

Apache Dubbo versions 2.7.0 to 2.7.4, 2.6.0 to 2.6.7, and all 2.5.x versions contain an insecure deserialization caused by accepting untrusted Java objects in HTTP POST requests, letting attackers fully compromise a Provider instance if HTTP is enabled, exploit requires attacker to send malicious Java object.

Severity: Critical
POC:
  • https://github.com/fairyming/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Dor-Tumarkin/CVE-2019-17564-FastJson-Gadget
  • https://github.com/Exploit-3389/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Hu3sky/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/Jaky5155/CVE-2019-17564
  • https://github.com/r00t4dm/CVE-2019-17564

KEV: True

Shodan Query: NA

Acceptance Criteria: The template must include a complete POC and should not rely solely on version-based detection. Contributors are required to provide debug data(-debug) along with the template to help the triage team with validation or can also share a vulnerable environment like docker file.

Rewards will only be given once the template is fully validated by the team. Templates that are incomplete or invalid will not be accepted. Avoid adding code templates for CVEs that can be achieved using HTTP, TCP, or JavaScript. Such templates are blocked by default and won’t produce results, so we prioritize creating templates with other protocols unless exceptions are made.

You can check the FAQ for the Nuclei Templates Community Rewards Program here.
entry.summary:
漏洞信息

漏洞名称： Apache Dubbo 反序列化漏洞

漏洞编号
